redeemModal.validCode: > Oops! Please enter a valid code to redeem.
redeemModal.errUserCode: > It looks like you're trying to redeem a user premium code here. Please use `/redeem` in my DM to apply your premium code.
redeemModal.userPremiumExist: > You're already on our premium list, no need to redeem again!
redeemModal.userSuccess: Congrats! You're now a premium user starting today, and your access will expire <t:{{duration}}:R>.
redeemModal.errGuildCode: > It seems you're trying to redeem a server premium code here. Please use `/redeem` in a server with Administrator permissions to apply it.
redeemModal.guildPremiumExist: > This server is already enjoying premium status!
redeemModal.guildSuccess: Success! This server is now a premium server, and the premium access will expire <t:{{duration}}:R>.
